name: Mike Pool
text: Beware, this place is only good if you are buddies with the auctioneers, they will "end bids" quick for their buddies or "conveniently miss your bid" so their friend can get it...small time auction with buddy system results....NEW PPL DO NOT GO HERE TO BUY CARS...  its a shame the owner and gm overlook it and allow this to happen. If there was a shake up of the auctioneers this would probably be a good auction..It has good location and decent amount of cars. buy fees are fair....It looks like most of the 5star reviews are generic ones or from folks affiliated with auction. Its NOT a 5star auction. This is an honest review.

name: chackos123
text: Nice little auto auction.  The staff was very friendly and incredibly helpful.  I wouldn't hesitate to do business with them again

text: Can not trust this company. They don't advertise correctly. They take pictures of the vehicle where it looks great but NOT the damage or worse parts. I just bought a step deck trailer which looked great on the internet/ website but came to pick it up and boom SURPRISE.  Trailer has cracks and very bad frame damage which was not pictured on the website. How can they not see that and take/post pictures as well,  when it's VERY obvious of the damages. I feel i was scammed!

name: Pye C
text: Nate D. Is awesome! Very friendly and extremely professional. He went above and beyond to assure my safety as well as towing my vehicle to a convenient location for me. I would recommend his services at any time! I am so appreciative of him going above just towing my vehicle he made me feel safe and made my LO comfortable during our tow. Thanks Nate!

name: Jason Horton
text:
My grapple truck broke down only 2 miles from where it was going. I called pro tow and they gave me a price of what it should be to go that short distance. After they delivered the truck they told me it would be 487.00.
I will not be using this company ever again.
I’ve never been charged that much for such a short distance. It’s rediculous!!!

name: Angela Mulkin
text: The lady was very nice and went out of her way to help me

name: Jordan
text:
The staff was great. I called and dispatch was positive and forthcoming with rates and expectations to when my vehicle would be picked up. I was able to speak with the drivers and coordinate a pickup time. Upon arrival the guys were really friendly and positive. I found this to be comforting considering my mind was concerned on pending mechanic bills. Once the guys had me hooked up I called back in and payment was accepted over the phone. I hope I never need them again however I’ll know who to call if I do.

Thanks! - Jordan

name: Ben Turner
text: Great experience on Saturday with this company. Had to pick up on I-65 and the driver was extremely helpful and informative on the best way to get our vehicle safely onto his truck and off the highway. Highly recommend this company.

name: Christopher Slaughter
text: Awesome group of peopme!!! Got mycar returned to me with no hassle. Woulfd recommend themtoanyone

name: Dante Greenbrier
text: On time, got it. Done no worries

name: Nicole Glenn
text: They are always quick and very reasonably priced!

name: Bill Mccall
text: George was very professional and helpful.

name: AC Dye
text: Kevin went above and beyond to make sure we were taken care of. We won't hesitate to give Pro-Tow a call if we ever need a tow in the future. Thank you!

name: Lynn Morgan
text: Super high on rates and wouldn't let me get my insurance info out of my car so I could get a release to pick it up it was only there 36 hours it cost 300 dollars to get it absolutely highway robbery

name: Victor Olivas
text: Joseph was very nice and helpful.

name: Pam Norris
text: Very professional, came to tow my truck in a reasonable time frame. Reasonable towing fee!

name: Craig
text: I had a great experience with this service!!! My car wasn’t running right which already put me in a bad mood but when I called, the driver called me back shortly and told me he was on the way. When he got there (George) he was very polite and did not overcharge me at all, like some of the other reviews I’ve read. Then he took it to the dealership and dropped it off and gave them the keys and everything they needed to contact me all without me ever having to go up there. Great service and I will definitely be using them every single time if this is the kind of service they continue to offer! They definitely lived up to their professional name, in my opinion.

name: Shantele mccarter
text: Very respectful and professional workers. makes you feel like you couldn't have went to no better place. I would recommend this place 100%

name: Reggie Allen
text: Mannnn Nate D. Is the best. Very professional and understanding. I was in a bad mood, I got rained on. JUST A HOT MESS TBH. But Nate came right on time and quick I probably wasn’t even waiting ten minutes. I’m going to make sure that I refer as much as possible. Thank you NATEEEEE D.

name: carl matheny
text: Driver started my car and avoided tow. Thanks!

name: Lyric Brogden
text: George arrived to my vehicle in less than 15 minutes (before I did) and was friendly and professional.  I was parked in a weird spot, but it didn’t take him long to maneuver around and get my car loaded up and we were on the way.  I found his manner nice, he did a great job for me and the price was reasonable.  I recommend without any reservations.

name: Angie Thomas
text: I had a very helpful, friendly and professional driver tow my vehicle to their lot. Super helpful staff!

name: Aiden Blaine
text: Suffice was friendly and fast. Got in and got out in an exceptionally reasonable amount of time.

name: China Cazeau
text: Got into a minor accident at the entrance of the subdivision where I live. Pro-tow tried to charge me $375 to bring my car to my drive way. I understand making money but that is a complete crook behavior.

name: Chris Horwedel
text: My Tahoe was stranded in a parking lot in Bluff Park and wouldn't start. I needed a short tow to my house in Homewood where I could work on it. George called to let me know he was on the way. He was very pleasant, good sense of humor, professional, and did good job. He unloaded my vehicle perfectly in my driveway. I couldn't ask for a better transaction. Thanks George.

name: TAMEKA DIXON
text: Nate D. #93 was great to work with during such a tense and scary time.

name: Tommy Goodridge
text: I had a great experience with Pro-Tow! They were very prompt and professional. I encourage that they be used for all towing needs. Many thanks go to Mica, he is very respectful I consider him a good friend. He even invited me to his church! How great is that. They are my best towing experience thus far.

name: Tammy Abston
text: Everyone I dealt with from the person answering the phone, to the driver, and the Supervisor who hand delivered 2 signs for our neighborhood property, was very polite. They gave me all the information needed without having to ask. Great experience.

name: Deborah Barth
text: They just saved us! Enclosed tailgate trailer lost a wheel on the highway and sheered the lugs off, so they had to pull it up on a rollback. From call to driveway in 2 hours. (We live in Pelham and were driving home from T-town when it happened.) Called AAA and a couple of other companies close to where we were broke down before calling them and no one could help. They'll be the first call next time. Thank you so much!!

name: dexter leigeber
text: They were prompt and the driver was very courteous. Handled it all over the phone saving me a 120 mile round trip.

name: Kelli Caulfield
text: Scott and Joe have pretty much saved me an my business these last few days. Timely, efficient, great customer service, and excellent price. To say that we’re grateful for them would be an understatement. Glad we’re able to work with this excellent team.

name: JaRon Thomas
text: Everything about my experience with them was terrible. I wouldn't recommend nor would i use them again.

name: Shaw Dunn
text: Very professional from start to finish. Nate helped me get my Jeep out of the mud and was very nice the entire time. Would recommend.

name: Dora Williams
text: Our truck broke down in Hoover early one Sunday morning and had to get a tow back home to McCalla. The driver who came was very professional and polite. He took very good care of our vehicle. We did have to wait awhile for them to show up,  but the said he had been extremely busy that night and was apologetic for the wait.  I would recommend them.

name: Je'Kora Braxton
text: As soon as I called I got put on hold for almost 20 minutes and the phone disconnected.

name: Alyssa Evans
text: Super experience. Nate was awesome. Maybe some day I’ll quit running into ditches. 🤪

name: Rapheal King
text: Very helpful and great customer service

name: laurie burton
text: We had a wonderful experience with John on Friday. He took the upmost care with my 4Runner and was very helpful. I highly recommend your service!

name: arthur nelson
text: Great

name: Kimberly Breckenridge
text:
Best towing service ever!! Especially when my son Nate is your driver ;)
Loves what he does and has excellent reputation! He has the references to prove it!

name: Jade Smith
text: Friendly and professional staff, "thorough".

name: Kevin Patterson
text: I was very pleased with this towing company, the driver made it to me in good time I did not have to wait long very professional and courteous.

name: Trevor Walczy
text: Nate D #96 , excellent experience with this diver , he showed up quicker then I could imagine when I was locked out of my car on a work trip !!!

name: Kerri Linley
text: Nate was very professional.  Arrived in a timely manner.   Highly recommend this company for your towing needs.

name: jeromeHowlingFunRV Adventures
text: My transmission went out while pulling a trailer and I called Weil Wrecker service who is owned by Pro Tow, they  towed by a truck from Greensprings to Valleydale Rd,  Droped my trailer and towed my truck to Jeffs Transmission on Morgan Rd... They charged me $425.00 That was on a Friday, Monday I called to complain and the gentleman said that sounded high and he’d have to talk to the boss when he got there at 12. He called a few hours later and said he hadn’t forgot me and then I never heard anything else from him again. My truck is a 3/4 Dodge NOT. Semi truck.

name: Joseph Bibb
text: Quick service, friendly driver made all that was going on a better situation

name: Eric Hahn
text: Yall were great, got there quicker than i thought you would and got me and the truck to nextran in 2 pieces....cant ask for more than that. Everyone i spoke with was super nice too.loved that

name: Justin Simmons
text: Over priced

name: David King
text: The guy who runs the impound yard is a major jackwagon.  I had my car stolen and recovered by Hoover that same night which was a Friday.  They are charging me a tow fee on top of 30$ a day storage even though I couldn't recover the car till Monday due to having the Hoover records open to issue a release form.  One of the biggest rackets I have encountered.   Tried going in today to plead with them but the manager wasn't hearing any of it, even scoffed at me when I wanted a copy of the release report back, like I am the criminal.

name: KinG Johnson-Bankhead
text: This place is a joke. The manager talks to you like your a idiot

name: Zuffenhauz
text: Weil has always delivered on customer service, well-equipped staff and trucks, helped me in hoover, bham, bessemer, etc

name: Mike Williams
text: just tell police department or fire u will get someone else to tow ur vehicle .. I guess this place has a contract with hoover...had a engine fire tow truck was called not by me... I coulda got it towed for nothing with insurance... but no against my better judgement I just figured insurance would take care of it..... they towed it about 6 miles to their shop was told wouldn't cost anything but the $30 a day storage but a $250 to my house 22 miles away.... was lied to..later called their office about getting something towed was gonna come to about $160.00 ... 22 miles from my house... so why $250 from same distance..... later that night had someone go pay the bill total was $310.00... my insurance towed it next day to my house .. no out of pocket... if ur vehicle needs to be towed ur already in a bind this company makes it worse!!!

name: Zuffenhauz
text: Weil has always delivered on customer service, well-equipped staff and trucks, helped me in hoover, bham, bessemer, etc

name: Elizabeth Logan
text: My driver was awesome- made me feel very comfortable and was not in a rush to finish the job and leave.... made sure I had a ride- etc!!!

name: rodneygrill
text: This is the official towing services for the city of  Hoover.  I am guessing there are some serious kickbacks involved her as this place is totally lacking in customer service. If you need a tow, call anyone else.  These people will wreck your car and overcharge for it, all the time treating you like a criminal.

text: Great
